Nightlight:

"I wont rest till my family is back and safe"said firmy Nighlight whose was 
tired to see every single of her loved one corrupted or menaced "I'll do 
whatever it takes to do it... Whatever it takes."

Nightlight was surpriced by her own new found courage, but she was tired to 
feel defendless and tired to hide... Maybe it was time to fight back.

Perceptor walked around and watched the scene

-----Mensaje original----- 
From: Super Cyclonus
Sent: Saturday, August 13, 2011 2:25 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Nightmares . . .

> <OLD - NIGHTSHIFT>
>
> Nightshift opens his com link and tries to keep it low key.  He knew 
> silence
> would be his greatest weapon as far as keeping Elita safe.
>
> " I copy you, Lord Elder, I'm seven hundred breams North by Northeast, and
> Elita is with me and safe in my cab.  All doors are locked for security
> reasons." Oh Sir ya might wanna keep an eye on Rodimus, he doesn't look 
> like
> himself right now.."

<NEW>

LORD ELDER got a suspicious look on his face since the coordinates
were sound somewhat familiar to TUSCON's location. Both LEO and ELDER
looked at each other knowingly. ELDER was about to say something to
that affect when LEO got a call . . .

> <OLD TUSCON>
>
> " Leo Prime, I am flying Noctorro back to the damaged Fuzors and I will
> stand guard with them until help arrives.  In the mean time, Rodimus has
> fallen back into evil hands and I think it's best if he is barred from
> leadership duties until further notice.  I don't like being this harsh, 
> but
> right now he can't be trusted.  Tell Bump to secure Nightlight in the med
> bay and put the Ark in immediate lockdown. We can't afford to take any
> chances."

> <OLD NIGHTLIGHT>
>
>
> "I heard that"said Nighlight while she looked as if she where to have a
> nervous break down"he is... his dark side has came back isnt?... What
> happened??"

<NEW>

LEO PRIME looked at both ELDER as well as LEGACY and WING CALIBER as
things were begining to fall into place, at least as far as NIGHSHIFT
and ELITA.

LEO looked at NIGHTLIGHT, "I don't know completely what happened yet,
but we will find out as soon as we can." He put a consoling arm around
NIGHTLIGHT's shoulders. "But why don't we take you back to your
quarters where you can rest. You have just taken on a new form and
your body will need time to adjust."

There was a smile from ELDER, "When we will get to the bottom of this
we will let you know everything. I promise."

(TAG)

Preston
